ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Bilateral Otosclerosis (Progressed)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: History of bilateral otosurgery, severe-to-profound mixed hearing loss, and otologist confirmation of disease progression.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Benign Paroxysmal Positional Vertigo (BPPV)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Dizziness triggered by turning head quickly in bed; treated with Epley maneuver.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Orthostatic Hypotension
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Dizziness reported mainly upon standing up.

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess the degree and configuration of the reported hearing decrease.
To evaluate speech recognition abilities and potential benefit from amplification.
Standard battery test, though not measured in this case due to previous otosurgery.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: The patient presents with severe-to-profound mixed hearing loss bilaterally, indicating progression of otosclerosis. Speech recognition is very poor (30-40%), suggesting limited benefit from traditional amplification. Dizziness symptoms are consistent with BPPV and orthostatic hypotension.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Severe mixed loss (250-1500 Hz), rising to moderately severe SNHL at 2000 Hz, sloping to severe/profound mixed. Left ear: Profound mixed loss (250-500 Hz), rising to severe (1000-2000 Hz), sloping to profound. Masking dilemmas noted.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRT: Right 80 dB HL, Left 87 dB HL. WRS: Right 40%, Left 30% (very poor).

tests.name: Tympanometry
tests.result_summary: Not measured due to previous otosurgery.

counseling_actions: Counseling on BPPV and performance of the Epley maneuver
Discussion of otosclerosis progression and limited benefit of current hearing aids
Advice on safety precautions regarding driving and fall prevention

escalation.rationale_short: For consideration of cochlear implantation given poor speech discrimination and severity of loss.

follow_up_plan.objective: Monitor hearing thresholds and re-evaluate management options.
